context.p: This function allows users to directly register the StellarProtect agent to a specific group via the StellarOne web console.

step.cmd: Select the StellarProtect or StellarProtect (Legacy Mode) tab.
Click Download to download the Installer Package.
The Select a group window appears.
Select a group for the agent and click Download. Click the Close button to close the window.
A file named Group.ini has been downloaded. Place the Group.ini file as the top level file in the agentâ€™s installer package
User can check the StellarOne console and StellarProtect or StellarProtect (Legacy Mode) agent console to see if the agent is successfully registered.
